languages.text: "Это... очень приятные слова, Вольный Торговец. Благодарю — и за слова, и за гостеприимство". {n}Она бросает на вас еще один, слегка озадаченный взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Это... очень приятные слова, Вольный Торговец. Благодарю — и за слова, и за гостеприимство". {n}Она бросает на вас еще один, слегка озадаченный взгляд.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

languages.text: “这可真是……太客气了，行商浪人。谢谢你，无论是你的话语，还是你的好意。”{n}她又看了你一眼，眼神中有些困惑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这可真是……太客气了，行商浪人。谢谢你，无论是你的话语，还是你的好意。”{n}她又看了你一眼，眼神中有些困惑。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

languages.text: «Son palabras... muy corteses, Comerciante Independiente. Se lo agradezco... tanto sus palabras como su hospitalidad». {n}Te mira otra vez, un tanto confusa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Son palabras... muy corteses, Comerciante Independiente. Se lo agradezco... tanto sus palabras como su hospitalidad». {n}Te mira otra vez, un tanto confusa.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「それは…なんと丁重な言葉か、自由開拓者よ。感謝する…その言葉と、もてなしの両方に」{n}アルジェンタはまた、やや困惑したような表情を浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それは…なんと丁重な言葉か、自由開拓者よ。感謝する…その言葉と、もてなしの両方に」{n}アルジェンタはまた、やや困惑したような表情を浮かべた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das sind ... sehr höfliche Worte, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Danke — für Eure Worte und für Eure Gastfreundlichkeit." {n}Sie blickt dich erneut an, etwas verwirrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das sind ... sehr höfliche Worte, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Danke — für Eure Worte und für Eure Gastfreundlichkeit." {n}Sie blickt dich erneut an, etwas verwirrt.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont là... des paroles fort courtoises, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous remercie... pour ces mots et pour votre hospitalité. » {n}Elle vous jette un regard visiblement troublé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Those are... very courteous words, Rogue Trader. Thank you — both for your words and your hospitality." {n}She gives you another, somewhat puzzled look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont là... des paroles fort courtoises, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je vous remercie... pour ces mots et pour votre hospitalité. » {n}Elle vous jette un regard visiblement troublé.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, sözlerin... Çok hürmetkâr. Misafirperverliğin ve bu güzel sözlerin için minnettarım." {n}Biraz şaşkın bir ifadeyle sana bir bakış daha atıyor.{/n}
